website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for the avid camper or beachgoer, who wants his furry friend to be comfortable and protected from the weather.
pros: The bed is lightweight and comes in a convenient travel bag
Leg reinforcements in the middle ensure the bed is strong and stable
Detachable canopy effectively protects your pet from the sun without blocking their line of sight
Fabric attached to the frame with strong hook-and-loop straps, so you can pull it tight or leave it looser
whatever is more comfortable for your pet
cons: Relocating the bed after assembly is awkward to do

customer_reviews.title: Worst Bed Ever
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my dog could lay out in the sun/shade on snowy or hot days off the ground with a little comfort. He lays on other raised beds just fine, but I got this one because it had a canopy. If we go beyond the Velcro flap that does not hold the edges together because it’s too narrow, or the difficulty getting thing together; the quality is poor. The material they used for the bedding and support fabric is like duct tape. Super easy to tear in 1 direction. My dog had it for 10 minutes and ripped it apart into strips. One of the worst product I’ve gotten so far for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Scintilla

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! It looks very nice. I use it to keep my dogs fluffy bed off of the ground for that extra softness. It also makes daily cleaning much easier for me- just sweep underneath! No hair collecting around the edges of a soft bed. In addition to being sturdy enough for my dog to play and lay in. It has also held up 100% to nieces & nephews from toddler to preteen putting it through some stress. I keep the tent portion on even indoors so my dog can feel like he has his own lil cave den room- He loves it. Great product and easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Doggie Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy (metal, good stitching), Easy to assemble & on floors— non skid/non slip/non sratch (plastic covers) feet. Loved by large/small back injury prone arthritic dogs because of its breathable mesh that provides support without the hard trampoline or sagging feel. Keeps pups cooler/warmer than floor/traditional beds. 4 stars for price (lower for larger beds) & doesn’t fold (would be a plus) but it’s a forever, good for travel bed. Tip: Size up for max comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Red pet

customer_reviews.title: If my puppy is happy, I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for camping but my puppy loves it so much that it now has a permanent home in my living room. It’s easy to assemble, clean when dirty, and dries quickly. My pup is 67 lbs. and growing and has a lot of room to stretch out or curl up on this cot. She’s not too crazy about the top though.
customer_reviews.author: 1puppy & a headache

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The concept is fantastic. Instructions were decent. However the execution was awful. The bed wouldn’t completely fit together. Not sure if the poles were shoddy or the bed piece itself was short. Couldn’t Velcro the one side to keep it tight. My 110lb Shepherd loves it anyway and was smart enough to lay on the good side. I won’t even take it apart in fear of never being able to get it even halfway put back together.
customer_reviews.author: CourtneyK13

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if my spoiled husky would like this but she absolutely loves this and refuses to sleep inside at night now. This was easy to set up and arrived quickly. I'm sure this will be as great in the summer as it is in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy for puppys or dogs that likes to chew
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for my dog dogs to share and it was destroyed within a month. They were able to chew it up so easily. Definitely would not recommend for puppies.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Helpful in keeping decreasing heat and wetness from the pavement during summer and after the rain. They also use it during the winter month as a barrier from the cold cement. The top kind of throws them but in all happy they have it. Have also used it on a lawn and on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: My Rottweilers love these beds.
customer_reviews.text: We love these trampoline beds, and so do our three year old Rottweiler sisters. They spend a lot of time on our deck, but they like to be in the shade when it's warm outside. They used the beds immediately after we put them together. We highly recommend these for large dogs. Our girls are about 100 lbs, and the beds support them easily. We are happy that the beds give them a soft place to rest when they are outside. The beds took about a half hour each to put together. Alice from Ohio
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Trying to convince Standard Poodle puppy bed is preferred over wet ground and grass clippings. He is actually catching on. Older Poodle and cat got it immediately. All sharing nicely. Easy to assemble. Did run nylon cord through loops and secured with tent tie-downs to secure in coastal winds.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely loved be this! It’s large enough for both of Beagles to stretch out and they share it often. I haven’t used the canopy as we have a lot of shade and they like lying in the warm sun anyway.
customer_reviews.author: JMCinNC

customer_reviews.title: Great dog bed for the deck!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is adorable. I have it on my deck. One of my dogs jumps on it with no problem, but my more timid pooch is hesitant to climb on (though he is capable). I think he finds the height intimidating, but I think it's a great bed!
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice place for the pups!
customer_reviews.text: The pups were a bit skeptical, but they came around after I put their blanket on there.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Peterson

customer_reviews.title: ... so we leave it off and he's kind of dumb so most of the time he crawls under it ...
customer_reviews.text: My old english bull dog loves his xl bed but he keeps pulling the tent part out so we leave it off and he's kind of dumb so most of the time he crawls under it and sleeps like that. But he's just a weird dog to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nobody likes it.
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to put together. The bars would not fit. My dogs have laid on this once when we first got it and haven’t paid any attention to it since. Also, the top does not protect from rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: This item is Xtra Large!
customer_reviews.text: Review the dimensions this is very large. Fits both my dogs and they will actually get on it. Very sturdy parts. Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December and it's now April it took just about 4 months to completely unravel and trying to put it together was terribly difficult
customer_reviews.author: Smokerofstars

customer_reviews.title: Superjare Lg/XLg Dog Cot very useful and comfortable for my large dog.
customer_reviews.text: The material is good quality material. It appears it will last a good while. She feels comfortable in it and it's plenty big. She weighs over 100lbs. so it's hard to get something big enough for her that's affordable. the price was decent. It's easy to move around for cleaning or moving to different rooms. Very pleased. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MammawJ

customer_reviews.title: Our Hunter is happy!
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is bigger than the last one he had. He fits very nicely on this one . Hunter is our german shepard who weighs 90lbs. I am very happy with our purchase. In no time he was on the bed and enjoying it along with his blankets.
customer_reviews.author: olga cortez

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for my husky staying outside under trees and a balcony for all seasons
customer_reviews.author: PhuongAnh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and my pups love it. They both fit on the XL. 15lbs each so they have plenty of space to lay!
customer_reviews.author: Litlefish

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and easy assemble. The canopy is a bit too low and my dog sees it as a deterent to get in while it is on. So I took off the canopy so my dog can get on and off easier.
customer_reviews.author: Queenbee

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Withstood some pretty major storms like a champ. I have three of them and the dogs love them.
customer_reviews.author: JoeDingles

customer_reviews.title: X-large cot
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves to use it when he lays outside on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Petway

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to order another one I have a great Dane half mastiff and it's great for his dog house
customer_reviews.author: Laurie WEEKS

customer_reviews.title: Dog enjoys
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product. Unfortunately my husband ran over one of the legs and we can't get replacement
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Cooling off
customer_reviews.text: My puppy lays on it while we are out at the pool keeps him cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this cot
customer_reviews.text: My 102 lb. doggy loves her pet cot, looks like a queen on it.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Noone

customer_reviews.title: My dog approves
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a major pain in the butt to assemble. Takes longer than our tent! But my dog loves lounging in it!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Griego

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed with shade for the pups. They love it in the backyard to lounge about.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my girls very easy to put together and as you can see they love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: It is bigger than I expected. Easily fits my 80 lb golden.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

product_meta.title: SUPERJARE XLarge Dog Cot - Gray
feature_bullets: A LUXURIOUS ACCESSORY FOR FURRY KINGS & QUEENS!
